title: These Hilarious Game Of Thrones Memes Are Ruling The Internet & It’s Hard Not To Laugh At Them!
text:
View this post on Instagram
*starts snoring* sources: (1) don’t trust the b in apartment 23 (2) brooklyn nine nine (3, 6, 7) parks and recreation (4, 5) the office (8) scream queens (9) twitter (six_pac_mom) — #gameofthrones #got #hbo #asongoficeandfire #emiliaclarke #daenerystargaryen #lenaheadey #cerseilannister #gwendolinechristie #brienneoftarth #sophieturner #sansastark #maisiewilliams #aryastark #kitharington #jonsnow #peterdinklage #tyrionlannister #tyrionlannister #nicolajcosterwaldau #jaimelannister #isaachempsteadwright #branstark
A post shared by incorrect got quotes (@incorrectgotquotes) on Feb 10, 2019 at 6:59am PST
description: Game Of Thrones makers might have taken longer than ever to come up with the finale season, but fans can’t contain the excitement. As the premiere date for GoT season 8 is nearing, a lot of fans are already scratching their heads to come up with theories. And we all love these Game of Throne, don’t we? We all ardent fans are too passionate about the show.
